name: Neon Genesis Evangelion (1996)
description:
Neon Genesis Evangelion (1996) is an arcade game developed by Gainax. It was originally released in 1996. Gainax published the game.
You can play Neon Genesis Evangelion (1996) on PC.
It was produced by Takeo Isogai. It was directed by Shin Unozawa. Jun Enoki scored the game.
